author: Xuan Pang
description: Discover the top 10 free AI image generators of 2024, thoroughly tested and reviewed. Unleash your creativity with cutting-edge tools that transform your ideas into stunning visuals effortlessly.
md:
AI image generators harness [textual prompts](https://affine.pro/blog/top-25-ai-art-prompts-ideas-spark-your-creativity) to quickly create visuals. Through our exploration of numerous platforms, we've found that the possibilities with AI Generation are boundless. To assist you in selecting the top AI image generator, we've curated a list of the 10 Best AI Image Generators tailored for Text-to-Image AI creations. Let's dive in! # **What is AI Image Generator from Text?** ![j5mGAVuewA-I2IfQTqgDfYWqALY3GSLHA9ShY87siN4=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/j5mGAVuewA-I2IfQTqgDfYWqALY3GSLHA9ShY87siN4=) An AI Image Generator is a form of [artificial intelligence technology](https://www.techtarget.com/searchenterpriseai/definition/AI-Artificial-Intelligence#:~:text=Artificial%20intelligence%20is%20the%20simulation,speech%20recognition%20and%20machine%20vision.) capable of producing visual images based on [textual prompts](https://affine.pro/blog/top-25-ai-art-prompts-ideas-spark-your-creativity). Utilizing sophisticated machine learning algorithms, it comprehends and processes the textual input, subsequently generating images that align with the given description. Text-to-Image AI Image Generators find use in a multitude of areas, such as crafting illustrations for narratives, facilitating the creation of visual content, supporting designers, and enabling individuals with minimal artistic abilities to visualize their [concepts](https://affine.pro/blog/concept-maps-definition-features-benefits-examples). # **10 Best AI Image Generators of 2024 [FREE & Paid]** ## [**AFFiNE**](http://www.affine.pro)
AFFiNE stands out as a state-of-the-art AI image generator app, meticulously crafted to employ AI to streamline the [organization](https://affine.pro/blog/15-types-events-event-management-categories-examples), management, and collaboration on tasks, [projects](https://affine.pro/blog/best-project-planning-tools-software-for-teams-2023), and real-time information. What distinguishes AFFiNE is its unique offering as a free and [open-source](https://affine.pro/blog/five-best-open-source-miro-alternatives-2023) program, leveraging offline technology to ensure accessibility for all users. Explore AFFiNE AI, your true multimodal AI copilot, dedicated to turning "all your ideas into reality." ![tmr36IY2c-xzBtEzp_94jSDwdf9OonPOVl8d4WgBFM0=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/tmr36IY2c-xzBtEzp_94jSDwdf9OonPOVl8d4WgBFM0=) * **Text Generation** * **Image generation** ![tFmN6MQB9SJkhQdeWj3ZGVVJeTfDydjQWcPq9fRgXnU=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/tFmN6MQB9SJkhQdeWj3ZGVVJeTfDydjQWcPq9fRgXnU=) * **MindMap Generation** From the initial brainstorming phase to the detailed structuring of complex concepts, MindMap AI Generation intuitively understands your objectives, providing dynamic visual representations that bring clarity and depth to your planning. Ideal for project planning, creative brainstorming, or organizing research, AFFiNE AI ensures that your ideas not only take shape but flourish. * **Powerpoint Generation** Whether you're summarizing research findings, pitching a business idea, or conveying educational content, PowerPoint Generation assists by selecting appropriate layouts, inserting relevant images, and organizing your information cohesively. With AFFiNE AI, you're not just preparing slides; you're crafting impactful narratives that capture and retain your audience's attention. * **[Collaborative Capabilities](https://affine.pro/blog/affine-0-10-0-launch-week-day-5-5-stable-with-cloud-support-finally-available-to-every-pro-in-your-team)** For group work, the app should have collaborative features, making it easy to share and coordinate work with others in your group work. For more details, please go to the blog: [Introduction to AFFiNE's Cloud](https://affine.pro/blog/affine-0-10-0-launch-week-day-5-5-stable-with-cloud-support-finally-available-to-every-pro-in-your-team). ![O88V12dZ7eALpdMD8-6eyyfRec5yZyWiQxCnvNEb3r0=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/O88V12dZ7eALpdMD8-6eyyfRec5yZyWiQxCnvNEb3r0=) * **Data privacy** The self-host version of AFFiNE is designed with your data privacy and security in mind, allowing you to utilize the latest functionalities with peace of mind. For detailed instructions on how to get started, please visit https://docs.AFFiNE.pro/docs/self-host-AFFiNE. ![_CnwdRMJIbnogpgtwFeTG6uZmaQtkJsAUracaY6it0E=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/_CnwdRMJIbnogpgtwFeTG6uZmaQtkJsAUracaY6it0E=) ## [**Dall-E 3**](https://openai.com/dall-e-3) ![UzRPBBjA-eg-yuUuGA4aQP-TCPD0BnvwTqrK0xfaKFM=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/UzRPBBjA-eg-yuUuGA4aQP-TCPD0BnvwTqrK0xfaKFM=) [Dall-E 3](https://openai.com/dall-e-3) represents the latest advancement in AI image generation, pushing the boundaries of creativity and machine learning. This cutting-edge technology allows users to convert textual prompts into detailed, high-quality images, showcasing an unprecedented level of artistic and [conceptual understanding](https://affine.pro/blog/concept-maps-definition-features-benefits-examples). **Key Features:** * **Enhanced Image Resolution and Quality:** Dall-E 3 generates images with significantly improved resolution and detail compared to its predecessors. This ensures that the visuals are not only strikingly clear but also suitable for professional use, ranging from digital art to [marketing materials](https://affine.pro/blog/what-is-marketing-management-complete-guide). * **Advanced Understanding of Complex Prompts:** This version exhibits a deeper comprehension of intricate and nuanced text prompts, enabling the creation of images that accurately reflect specific requests. Whether it's capturing the mood, style, or thematic elements, Dall-E 3 translates textual descriptions into visuals with remarkable precision. * **Greater Creative Flexibility:** Dall-E 3 offers users an expansive canvas of creative possibilities. It supports a wider range of artistic styles, from photorealism to abstract art, and can generate unique compositions, characters, and scenarios, thereby broadening the horizon for creative expression and exploration. ## [**Craiyon**](https://www.craiyon.com/) ![NtpyXqg8Rv04Y9QglWjukgGLzPjylJkMUiDwYqZn-Y8=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/NtpyXqg8Rv04Y9QglWjukgGLzPjylJkMUiDwYqZn-Y8=) [Craiyon](https://www.craiyon.com/), formerly known as DALLÂ·E mini, emerges as an accessible AI-driven tool that democratizes the creation of images from textual prompts. It allows users to explore the intersection of language and visual art, transforming simple descriptions into imaginative visuals. **Key Features:** * **Accessibility and Ease of Use:** Craiyon is designed with a user-friendly interface, making it accessible to a broad audience regardless of their technical expertise. This feature encourages creativity and experimentation, inviting users to explore the potential of AI in generating diverse visual content from text inputs. * **Creative Exploration:** The platform enables users to experiment with a wide range of concepts and ideas, offering the freedom to explore various themes, styles, and scenarios. Craiyon's generative capabilities inspire users to push the boundaries of traditional art and design, facilitating the creation of unique and innovative images. * **Community and Sharing:** Craiyon fosters a community of creators and enthusiasts by facilitating the easy sharing of generated images. This not only promotes [collaboration](https://affine.pro/blog/power-of-collaboration-why-teams-need-to-work-together-for-success) and inspiration among users but also contributes to the evolving dialogue around the role of AI in creative processes, making it a valuable tool for artists, designers, and hobbyists alike. ## [**Midjourney**](https://www.midjourney.com/) ![0vt_3rg6_PpwNXlUXkso2oXO-_qbLilRD7_uXdV4tU4=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/0vt_3rg6_PpwNXlUXkso2oXO-_qbLilRD7_uXdV4tU4=) [Midjourney](https://www.midjourney.com/) introduces itself as an innovative AI image generator that navigates the creative process, transforming textual descriptions into visually compelling images. It stands out by offering a unique blend of artistic freedom and AI precision, catering to both creative professionals and enthusiasts seeking to explore new visual frontiers. **Key Features:** * **Highly Detailed Imagery:** Midjourney excels in producing images with remarkable detail and depth, bringing text-based prompts to life with stunning clarity. This level of detail allows for the creation of images that can be used across a variety of contexts, from digital art exhibitions to [conceptual designs](https://affine.pro/blog/concept-maps-definition-features-benefits-examples), enhancing the visual storytelling experience. * **Adaptive Learning and Creativity:** The platform is built on an adaptive learning model that continuously improves its understanding of textual inputs, enabling it to generate more accurate and creative interpretations over time. * **[Collaborative and Interactive Experience](https://affine.pro/blog/top-asynchronous-communication-tools-free):** Midjourney fosters a collaborative environment where users can interact with the AI, offering feedback that refines the image generation process. ## [**Canva AI**](https://www.canva.com/ai-image-generator/) ![yYPmeN2gxcGfN7-wPexTPao2_AgIt-YjXEPuCJqi9kI=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/yYPmeN2gxcGfN7-wPexTPao2_AgIt-YjXEPuCJqi9kI=) [Canva AI](https://www.canva.com/ai-image-generator/) marks a significant leap forward in integrating artificial intelligence within graphic design tools, enhancing Canva's already robust platform. It's designed to streamline the design process, making it more intuitive and efficient for users to bring their creative visions to life. Whether for professional graphics, [marketing](https://affine.pro/blog/what-is-marketing-management-complete-guide) materials, or personal projects, Canva AI simplifies and enriches the design experience. **Key Features:** * **Intelligent Design Suggestions:** Canva AI revolutionizes the way users approach design by offering smart, AI-driven suggestions tailored to their project needs. From layout adjustments to color scheme recommendations, Canva AI analyzes the content and context of the design, providing actionable insights that enhance both aesthetics and functionality. * **Automated Content Generation:** With Canva AI, users can leverage automatic text and graphic content generation. This feature not only saves time but also sparks creativity, allowing users to explore various design elements without manual input. * **Enhanced Image Editing:** Canva AI introduces advanced image editing capabilities, such as automatic background removal, image enhancement, and style transfer. ## [NightCafe](https://creator.nightcafe.studio/) ![Oms_PxSKOfSaqEAT8YrXy1w6Hmu38gul6zXu9Kw2J4A=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/Oms_PxSKOfSaqEAT8YrXy1w6Hmu38gul6zXu9Kw2J4A=) [NightCafe](https://creator.nightcafe.studio/) is an innovative AI art generator that leverages powerful artificial intelligence techniques to enable users to create unique, high-quality artwork from textual descriptions or by modifying existing images. It stands out for its accessibility and the diversity of creative outputs it can produce, catering to both art enthusiasts and professionals seeking to explore the bounds of AI-assisted [creativity](https://affine.pro/blog/top-8-proven-brainstorming-techniques-creativity). **Key Features:** * **Multiple Artistic Styles:** NightCafe offers an extensive range of artistic styles, from classic painting techniques to modern digital art forms. Users can experiment with styles inspired by famous artists or explore entirely new aesthetic realms, allowing for the creation of personalized artwork that resonates with their individual tastes and preferences. * **User-Friendly Interface:** The platform is designed with a focus on user experience, featuring an intuitive interface that simplifies the process of creating AI art. Whether you're a seasoned artist or a curious newcomer, NightCafe makes it easy to navigate through its features and produce artwork with just a few clicks. * **Community and Marketplace:** NightCafe not only provides tools for creating art but also fosters a vibrant community of creators. Users can share their creations, gather feedback, and draw inspiration from a wealth of user-generated content. ## [**DeepAI**](https://deepai.org/machine-learning-model/text2img) ![zd9r0-oBy3NQUoTuTyz3sKc22u_7JdOSXd1PvswW2Rs=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/zd9r0-oBy3NQUoTuTyz3sKc22u_7JdOSXd1PvswW2Rs=) [DeepAI](https://deepai.org/machine-learning-model/text2img) stands at the forefront of AI innovation, providing a suite of advanced artificial intelligence tools designed to empower creators, developers, and researchers. This platform specializes in deep learning technologies, offering accessible solutions for a range of applications including image generation, [text analysis](https://aws.amazon.com/what-is/text-analysis/#:~:text=Text%20analysis%20is%20the%20process,written%20text%20for%20business%20insights.), and more. **Key Features:** * **Diverse AI Tools:** DeepAI offers a comprehensive array of tools that cater to various aspects of AI implementation, from image recognition and style transfer to text-to-image generation and [sentiment analysis](https://aws.amazon.com/what-is/sentiment-analysis/#:~:text=Sentiment%20analysis%20is%20the%20process,social%20media%20comments%2C%20and%20reviews.). This variety allows users to explore different dimensions of AI technology within a single platform. * **Open API for Integration:** A key feature of DeepAI is its open API, which allows developers to seamlessly integrate DeepAI's capabilities into their own applications or workflows. This flexibility makes it easier for businesses and creators to incorporate advanced AI functionalities into their projects without extensive AI expertise. ## [**Runway AI**](https://runwayml.com/ai-tools/text-to-image/) ![Kmcp_AJfJOSvXwnwS4kA0-WZU_8AUlgp3Dq_zDO0hw4=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/Kmcp_AJfJOSvXwnwS4kA0-WZU_8AUlgp3Dq_zDO0hw4=) [Runway AI](https://runwayml.com/ai-tools/text-to-image/) represents a groundbreaking platform at the intersection of artificial intelligence and creative tools, offering artists, designers, and developers a comprehensive suite of AI-powered applications. With its mission to democratize AI's creative potential, Runway AI provides an innovative environment where users can experiment, build, and share cutting-edge visual content. **Key Features:** * **Expansive AI Model Library:** Runway AI boasts an extensive library of AI models covering a vast range of functionalities, from image and video synthesis to [natural language processing](https://www.oracle.com/in/artificial-intelligence/what-is-natural-language-processing/) and style transfer. * **Real-Time Collaboration and Editing:** The platform facilitates real-time collaboration, enabling users to work together on projects from different locations seamlessly. Runway AIâs live editing features ensure that team members can make adjustments and see results instantaneously, enhancing productivity and[creative synergy](https://affine.pro/blog/best-time-management-tools-techniques-create). ## **Bing image creator** ![xIkjSFOEIiF4JdAF50v1ikqDUBJwwSH_2X_6sHiEKr0=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/xIkjSFOEIiF4JdAF50v1ikqDUBJwwSH_2X_6sHiEKr0=) [Bing Image Creator](https://www.bing.com/create) marks Microsoft's foray into the rapidly evolving domain of AI-powered image generation, directly integrated into the Bing search engine. This innovative tool is designed to transform textual prompts into vivid, high-quality images, bridging the gap between imagination and visual representation. **Key Features:** * **Seamless Integration with Bing Search:** One of the standout features of Bing Image Creator is its seamless integration with Bing's search capabilities. Users can easily generate images related to their search queries, enhancing the search experience with visual creativity and insights. * **User-friendly Interface:** Bing Image Creator boasts a straightforward and intuitive interface, making it incredibly user-friendly. ## [**ClickUp**](https://www.googleadservices.com/pagead/aclk?sa=L&ai=DChcSEwir5sn_gIqFAxUhCXsHHSQJABIYABABGgJ0bQ&ase=2&gclid=EAIaIQobChMIq-bJ_4CKhQMVIQl7Bx0kCQASEAAYASABEgKqdPD_BwE&ohost=www.google.com.hk&cid=CAASJeRoIYPsfCWhqfZSePyMfBG1F8qPduy9c_JWSmCt1_se1fUURz8&sig=AOD64_14e7HtEGv8RW_sjiokh3hDgdA1nw&q&nis=4&adurl&ved=2ahUKEwiezMT_gIqFAxW0mq8BHRZbDK8QqyQoAHoECAYQDA) ![exGjzFOxWc38bllU5Frx_ei15yA_69M8rMZY-K9zBcQ=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/exGjzFOxWc38bllU5Frx_ei15yA_69M8rMZY-K9zBcQ=) ClickUp is an all-in-one project management software that offers hundreds of customizable features to give individuals and teams the flexibility and tools they need to work smarter and boost productivity. ClickUp has launched an AI content assistant feature, ClickUp AI, a content ideation and creation tool in ClickUp Docs that helps with [generating ideas, copywriting, copyediting](https://clickup.com/blog/copywriting-tools/), summarizing a long text writing content, and so much more. **Key features:** * **Content research and ideation**: Generate instant and high-quality content for blog posts, emails, advertising copy, and more * **Copy editing**: Get suggestions for writing improvements to simplify and improve your content * **Content summarization**: Summarize key points from Docs, tasks, and comments # **Which is the best AI image generator?** We've compiled a list of the top 10 AI image-generation tools. Which one aligns most with your needs? Currently, **AFFiNE** has released its [stable version](https://affine.pro/download), but we are continuing to build to a more feature-rich and stable build. ![tmr36IY2c-xzBtEzp_94jSDwdf9OonPOVl8d4WgBFM0=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/tmr36IY2c-xzBtEzp_94jSDwdf9OonPOVl8d4WgBFM0=) **Join our waiting list now to be among the first to experience the leap in creativity and efficiency brought by AFFiNE AIï¼** * Official Website:[https://affine.pro/](https://affine.pro/) * GitHub:[https://github.com/toeverything/AFFiNE](https://github.com/toeverything/AFFiNE) * Twitter:[https://twitter.com/AffineOfficial](https://twitter.com/AffineOfficial) * Communityï¼[https://community.affine.pro/home](https://community.affine.pro/home) * Discord:[https://discord.gg/Arn7TqJBvG](https://discord.gg/Arn7TqJBvG) * Telegram:[https://t.me/affineworkos](https://t.me/affineworkos)
